metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5808 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An error within the "find_green()" function (internal/dcraw_common.cpp) inLibRaw versions prior to 0.18.9 can be exploited to cause a stack-basedbuffer overflow and subsequently execute arbitrary code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5808` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.2
libraw16 - 0.18.8-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libraw package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.18.8-1ubuntu0.2').
ufraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
darktable: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
